title: The $300 Billion A.I. Infrastructure Crisis Hiding in Plain Sight
hypotheses: Traditional schedulers create systematic GPU underutilization despite massive infrastructure spending

weaknesses: Limited technical solutions proposed, primarily diagnostic rather than prescriptive
citation: Ghosh, I. (2025). The $300 Billion A.I. Infrastructure Crisis Hiding in Plain Sight. Observer.
